parameters.description: Api token granted to call the rest of the endpoints. You must call sessions/create to obtain a token and it will be valid for 15 minutes. After that, you must create another session.
parameters.name: apiKey

parameters.description: ID number of a company
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Single date and time to query data. Must be in ISO8601 format.
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: Number of days/hours to get daya from. Period is calculated backwards from now. For example, 1day means today. 7days means past 7 days and so on. The YTD value is the period from the beginning of the current year to now, different from 1year, which means the past 365 days. Posible values: ["1hour", "6hours", "12hours", "24hours", "72hours", "120hours", "168hours", "240hours", "336hours", "1day", "3days", "5days", "7days", "10days", "14days", "1month", "3months", "6months", "9months", "YTD", "1year", "2years", "3years"]
parameters.name: period

parameters.description: Specifies how small the period to fetch is. Posible values are: 'hourly' and 'daily'
parameters.name: resolution
